about_the_game:
Streamer Destiny is a pioneer in the streaming world. Love him or hate him, with a career spaning over a decade he has built one of the most dedicated communities in the industry. DGG, the Daliban, his followers have many names and the memes in the community are too many to count.

DGGWare is a collection of meme based micro games in the vein of WarioWare. Like Destiny's stream it covers topics from gaming, politics, philosophy, debate, art, culture and drama.

Friends and foes makes their appearences. It's a game for newcomers as well as memers from the old guard.

Don't let memes be dreams.

name: DggWare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
